p.k: In The Game After Mom cuts off Angeloâ€™s videogame time Angelo attempts to change her mind. He sets out to prove to her that gaming is an important skillset and becoming a professional gamer can be a lucrative career.
p.d: Angelo Rules follows twelve-year-old Angelo as he tries to control his life by using funny schemes - with a little help from his friends Sherwood and Lola.
